Shader::Shader ( std::string  vsPath,
std::string  fsPath 
)

Shader constructor.

Parameters:
vsPathpath to the vertex shader file. An empty string indicates no shader.

Member Function Documentation

void Shader::addParameter ( std::string  name,
GLuint  p 
)

Adds a parameter to the list of shared variables with this shader program, a so called uniform. The GLuint p is a OpenGL reference pointing to a variable with name name.

Parameters:
nameGLuint p is a OpenGL reference pointing to a variable with name name.
pGLuint p is a OpenGL reference pointing to a variable with name name.

void Shader::removeParameter ( std::string  name)

Removes the variable with the specified name from this Shader objects uniforms. Nothing happens if the variable is not present.

Parameters:
nameRemove this variable
